SEARCH
Module project.ccprog3mco2gui
Package project.ccprog3mco2gui.model

Class VendingMachineService

java.lang.Object
project.ccprog3mco2gui.model.VendingMachineService
public class VendingMachineService extends Object
A service class to manage instances of RegularVendingMachine and SpecialVendingMachine. This class uses the Singleton design pattern to ensure only a single instance of VendingMachineService exists.
